posts.title: I’m A Twat Surprise Mug
posts.content: Have some fun at the office by getting your unsuspecting coworkers to drink out of the “I’m A Twat” mug. Once your victim begins drinking from their plain white ceramic mug, the hidden message on the bottom lets everyone around know that they’re a twat.

posts.title: Cheeseburger Backpack
posts.content: Tote all your gear around just like Steven Universe by stuffing it into this cheeseburger backpack. It measures approximately 20 inches in diameter and comes topped with two plump buns, lettuce, tomato, and cheese – all of which unzip into separate pockets.

posts.title: Leatherman Super Multi-Tool
posts.content: Perform a variety of tasks without having to lug around a bulky toolbox by using the Leatherman super multi-tool. It sports a rugged stainless steel construction and comes jam-packed with 19 different tools such as wire-cutters, a metal file, and screwdrivers.

posts.title: Free-Style Hoverboard
posts.content: Feel as though you’re flying over the pavement without actually leaving the ground by hopping on this free-style hoverboard. This self-balancing scooter holds up to 220 pounds, features a cruising speed of 7 miles per hour and a range of 6.5 miles on a single charge.

posts.title: Thor Ragnarok Hulk Mask
posts.content: Hulk-out like never before by transforming yourself into Bruce Banner’s alter ego when you put on this Thor Ragnarok Hulk mask. The mask comes with movable eyebrows and a movable mouth piece so that you can let out a loud “Hulk smash!” whenever you want.

posts.title: Chocolate Milk Mixer Mug
posts.content: Lazyness and deliciousness collide when you use this amazing chocolate milk mixer mug to craft your favorite drinks. This nifty mug allows you to mix your favorite teeth rotting ingredients with just the push of a button! It’s like a mini-blender you can drink out of!

posts.title: Folding Saw
posts.content: Lumberjack and ninja forces have combined to bring you the folding saw. This katana-styled saw conveniently folds to decrease the risk of injury and also make it more portable. When you’re ready to do work, just bust open the 19.7″ blade and git-er-done.

posts.title: LEGO Ghostbusters
posts.content: Keep the paranormal under control with help from the LEGO Ghostbusters. The set includes the original four Ghostbusters dressed from head to toe with all their gadgets, and of course their trusty and tricked out Ectomobile. Even Slimer is joining in on the action.

posts.title: Rocking Inflatable Float
posts.content: Determine which of your friends is the weakest link as you try and knock each other off the rocking inflatable float. Once this rugged and sizable float is inflated, friendship and allegiance go out the window as you try to send the others to their watery grave.

posts.title: America: The Cookbook
posts.content: America: The Cookbook is your ticket to embarking on a gastronomic journey across our great nation without ever leaving your kitchen. It covers all aspects of the history of American cuisine, in addition to featuring essays by renowned chefs and 800 home-style recipes.

posts.title: Solar Powered Bug Zapper
posts.content: Make your backyard more enjoyable for the family by keeping pesky insects away using these solar powered bug zappers. They’ll help you save on your electric bill while keeping your yard bug free – so you can enjoy the outdoors without having to apply sticky bug spray.

posts.title: Human Organ Transport Lunch Bag
posts.content: If you enjoy grossing out your co-workers, get the organ transplant lunch bag for carrying around your sack of meat, or whatever you eat for lunch. You can tell your friends that it’s a kidney you’ve got to take to the hospital — and then you got hungry and ate it.
